item.title: Demos: Using Badges on Buttons
item.content:encoded: I needed to add some button notifications (known as badges) to some buttons. The following example uses css styled badges attached to buttons using the custom-data...

item.title: Demos: Simple openUI5 application II: How to create frontend in UI5 that will consume oData service
item.content:encoded: After the first part of tutorial, we have created and run oData service that can write/read data to SAP database table. In this part, I will explain how frontend openUI5 application works. Whole...

item.title: Demos: Soccer App built with OpenUI5
item.content:encoded: Have a look at this great world cup prediction game app built with OpenUI5. It shows your game predictions and infos on the stadiums as well. [source: http://www.tippfieber.de]
